Ingredients: WATER, GLYCERIN, SODIUM COCOYL GLUTAMATE, GLUCONOLACTONE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, NIACINAMIDE, SODIUM CITRATE, XANTHAN GUM, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, PROPANEDIOL, SODIUM CHLORIDE, SODIUM COCOYL ALANINATE, ZINC GLUCONATE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, GLYCOLIC ACID, MANDELIC ACID
